name: Band Report
script: send("writelog erc Foraging Status: " ..forageArea.. " - " ..forageStatus.. " prospects with " ..matches[2].. " bands present")
matches: ^Your scouts report that there appears to be approximately (\d+) bands of individuals already gathering\.$
^Your scouts report that there appears to be approximately (\d+) bands of individuals already gathering resources in this locale\.$
